anticipate

public void anticipate(IObservation previousObservation,
                       IAct act)
Description copied from interface: IObservation
Initialize this observation by anticipating the consequences of the intended act on the previous observation. Does not predict the square in front (leave it unchanged). TODO Anticipation should be refined using visual information.

Specified by:
anticipate in interface IObservation
Parameters:
previousObservation - The previous observation on which we construct the anticipated observation.
act - The intention act.

getConfirmation

public boolean getConfirmation()
Specified by:
getConfirmation in interface IObservation
Returns:
true if the anticipation was confirmed, false if the anticipation was incorrect

setConfirmation

public void setConfirmation(boolean confirmation)
Specified by:
setConfirmation in interface IObservation
Parameters:
confirmation - True If and only if the adjusted observation matches the anticipated observation (the criteria used to evaluate whether there is a match need to be define by the modeler)

Check from salient tactile features in Ernest's tactile map.

Specified by:
getTactileSalience in interface IObservation
Returns:
the possible tactile salience that indicates a wall in front of Ernest. Null if no wall in front of Ernest.
